snippet.title: Pocket Rumble – Nintendo Switch Trailer
snippet.description:
Pocket Rumble is a streamlined, beginner-friendly 2D fighting game inspired by SNK's classic fighters for the Neo Geo Pocket Color. It retains all the gameplay elements that make traditional Street Fighter-style fighters great, but reduces the level of execution and memorization necessary to the bare minimum. Experienced players can learn the game fast and be able to focus on deeper elements of strategy and mind games, new players can learn the ins and outs of fighting games without being overwhelmed!

Learn more about Pocket Rumble!  https://goo.gl/fZe8r8

#NintendoSwitch #Nindies #PocketRumble
